postReview.title: Everton 0-2 Manchester City: Late surge does the job for Guardiola
postReview.description: Manchester City moved one step closer to Champions League qualification with a hard-fought win over Everton on Saturday.

preReview.title: Haaland 'getting there' in injury comeback
preReview.description: As Erling Haaland works his way back from injury, Man City continue their quest for Champions League qualification at Everton.

QAData.question: Who won between Everton and Manchester City on Sat, 19 Apr 2025 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Manchester City won 2–0 over Everton on Sat, 19 Apr 2025 14:00:00 GMT.
